title: Fluffy Ranch
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Alpaca-san~, Emma-san came here to play.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ciao~! I’m Emma Verde!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ah, they’re coming closer.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Waaah, are you letting me pet you? Thank you~. There there, you’re so fluffy~. Hanayo-chan really took good care of you guys, didn’t she? Fufu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>You made friends with the alpacas already, huh, Emma-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It’s because you’re so kind, Hanayo-chan. It must’ve rubbed on their personalities.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eeeh!? W-, well, I’d be happy if that’s true....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’m sure of it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ehehe.... Emma-san, it’s time to feed them. Would you help me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Sure! Hey everyone, she said good food is coming. Eat a lot, okay~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
